user_query: Contact form on homepage not working with Netlify forms

issue_identified.problem: User was referring to WordPress site instead of Netlify site
issue_identified.root_cause: Two different sites - WordPress (insulationcontractorsofarizona.com) vs Netlify (azfoam.netlify.app)
issue_identified.diagnosis: Contact form IS working correctly on Netlify site but not configured on WordPress site

solution_provided.form_status: Properly configured with data-netlify=true, honeypot protection, and all required fields

recommendations: Consider domain migration to point insulationcontractorsofarizona.com to Netlify
Test form immediately at working Netlify URL
status: RESOLVED - Contact form working on Netlify site
